game.title: NodeCore

long_description:
# frameworks for nodecore!

craft frameworks out of wooden frames. they're smaller and can be rotated.

# naming?

cg = catgirl, nc = nodecore. this prefix should be sufficiently unique.

# TODO

- make framework optics-opaque only in the 1 dir.
- add lode versions
- come up with a better name for the nodes than "framework"?
	- the mod name will stay, because the mod does involve working with frames.
- make center of texture look like the rest of it.
- make ends look like they do in frames.
name: cg_nc_framework
title: NodeCore Frameworks
